channel.title: Network Troubleshooting - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: ICMP - type, code, and checksum fields Type 0 - Echo Reply Type 3 - Destination unreachable (16 values) Type 8 - Echo Request Type 11 - Time exceded Ping $ ping -c 3 www.google.com - count 3 times Traceroute $traceroute Netstat - displays network connections, routing tables, int info, etc. socket (ip and port) - interface that allows programs to send and receive data Port - used to identify which application should send or receive data
